description: This Dart source file defines the `GamePage` widget and associated classes for a Tic Tac Toe game implemented in Flutter. It manages game state, rendering of the game board, status indicators, and user interactions.

classes.name: GamePage
classes.description: Main widget for the Tic Tac Toe game screen, managing the game state and rendering UI.

classes.name: _GamePageState
classes.description: State class for `GamePage`, handles game logic, state management, and UI updates.

classes.name: _StatusBanner
classes.description: Widget displaying the current game status, including player turn, winner, or draw indicator.

classes.name: _PlayerBadge
classes.description: Visual badge representing a player ('X' or 'O') with styling and semantics.

classes.name: _Board
classes.description: Widget rendering the 3x3 game grid and handling cell interactions.

classes.name: _Cell
classes.description: Individual cell in the game grid, handles tap animation and displays 'X' or 'O'.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes animation controller and game variables when widget state is created.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of animation controllers when widget state is destroyed.

methods.name: _restart
methods.description: Resets the game board and state to start a new game.

methods.name: _handleTap
methods.description: Handles user tap on a cell, updates board state, checks for winner.

methods.name: _checkWinner
methods.description: Evaluates current board state to determine if there's a winner, draw, or game continues.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the entire UI of the game page, including status, board, and restart button.
